tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: King of the Greenie Board
programme.desc: Harm is now a Tomcat division commander aboard the carrier USS Patrick Henry that is patrolling the Mediterranean near Yugoslavia.

programme.title: JAG: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: The Russians are furious over the killing of their peacekeepers and the Navy sends Mac, Brumby, and Roberts to the Patrick Henry to conduct the court-martial of Lt. Buxton.

programme.title: JAG: True Calling
programme.desc: When a petty officer smuggles a pregnant Serbian woman aboard the carrier in order to save her from a vengeful fiancée, he's arrested and scheduled to be court-martialed.

programme.title: JAG: Psychic Warrior
programme.desc: When a Navy research project involving ESP and psychic phenomenon goes awry, resulting in the death of one of the research subjects, the Admiral in charge is court-martialed.

programme.title: JAG: Rouge
programme.desc: As the lowest ranking lawyer at JAG, Bud is assigned to accompany Raglan, a former Special Forces operative who is hired by the Pentagon to test security at military bases.

programme.title: JAG: Mishap
programme.desc: Skates", Harm's RIO when he was aboard the USS Patrick Henry, was the Landing Safety Officer in charge of the deck when a Tomcat crashes while making an emergency landing.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Into the Breach
programme.desc: Harm and Mac agree to help guide young student "attorneys" at Iron Forge Naval Academy, a prep school for the US Naval Academy, as they conduct a mock trial.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Boomerang (Part 2)
programme.desc: Hostilities between Harm and Brumby escalate both in and out of the courtroom and it takes Chegwidden, with Brumby's CO's approval to get them to deal with their anger.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People V. Gunny
programme.desc: Gunny is charged with gay-bashing following an off duty altercation outside a gay bar.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.sub-title: The Bridge At Kang So Ri
programme.desc: Harm and Mac board a plane bound for Korea to investigate charges that GI's shot and killed civilians during the Korean War.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.

programme.title: Scorpion: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.sub-title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.desc: As Team Scorpion anxiously awaits the verdict of Cabe's trial which could send him to prison, they focus their nervous energy on trying to save a dog stuck in a cistern.

programme.title: Scorpion: A Christmas Car-Roll
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, when Walter chooses work over spending quality time with his friends, he falls down the stairs and hits his head, and as he lays unconscious, he enters a dream world where Team Scorpion never existed.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Bunker Games
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with Toby's nemesis, Quincy Berkstead and his wife, Amy , when they are locked inside an artificially intelligent doomsday bunker that aims to kill them.

programme.title: Scorpion: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
programme.desc: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wave Goodbye
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must prevent an incoming tsunami from hitting a vulnerable nuclear power facility, and Toby secretly helps his ex-fiancée retrieve her stolen identity.

programme.title: Scorpion: Nerd, Wind and Fire
programme.desc: On Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans to help a doctor and pilot trapped inside a helicopter that crashed atop a skyscraper.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dumbster Fire
programme.desc: The geniuses of Team Scorpion turn into knuckleheads and Paige must simplify the science for them, when their mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dork Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Team Scorpion inadvertently crashes a bank robbery in progress and is taken hostage. Also, Sylvester's feelings for Florence grow.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Gator Done
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to the bayou to track down a cagey alligator in order to stop a deadly mosquito-borne virus, and Paige teaches Walter the concept of the 'white lie.'.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Foul Balls
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must use their high IQs to win a softball game when the homeland director challenges, with all of their future government contracts on the line.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Honour Roll
programme.desc: After their High School Outreach assignment goes awry, Andy and Chris stumble on the victim of avicious beating behind a nightclub.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Girlfriend of the Year
programme.desc: After a routine speed trap leads to a messy accident on a city highway, Chris and Gail find one of the cars mysteriously empty and quickly realize that itslicense plate matches the one being broadcast in a citywide “Amber Alert”.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Big Nickel
programme.desc: Andy’s attempt to avoid Swarek is thwarted whenbothare assigned to a prisoner transport. When things go awry and theinmate breaks loose, the two officers are led on a cat-and-mouse foot chase through the meandering woods.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: To Serve or Protect
programme.desc: What was to be a routine day for Andy is abruptly put on holdwhen herex-copper father, Tommy, confesses that he might have committed a serious crime during one of his alcohol-induced blackouts.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Judgment Day
programme.desc: There’s a nervous tension in the air on Judgment Day for all therookies at 15 Division who will have to undergo make-or-break assessments by Staff Sergeant Frank.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Takedown
programme.desc: Andy and Chris accidentally screw up one of the biggest drug busts of the decade when they arrest one of the players. In an effort to save the operation, Swarek and Andy go undercover to make the drug buy.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Butterflies
programme.desc: Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Might Have Been
programme.desc: Everyone's living their “might-have-beens.” Andy and Gail go undercover as cocktail waitresses to clean up a drug-infested club, but get more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Bad Moon
programme.desc: As a full moon hangs over the city, the rookies are unnerved by a series of strange occurrences. While investigating the theft of three severed heads, Andy and Swarek pick up the trail of a mentally unstable man who has stopped taking his medication.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart & Sparks
programme.desc: As 15 Division recovers from the shooting of Det. Luke Callaghan, a series of arsons culminates in the torching of a laundromat – and the rookies are forced to confront their own burning issues.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Karl in the main prison block, Stuart checks out the isolation unit, with dramatic results.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Shire Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the courtroom of one of Dorchester’s most historical buildings and is suddenly surrounded by unexplained occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Shire Hall P2
programme.desc: Under the main building of Dorchester Shire Hall there is a warren of tunnels and cells. Stuart enters this area that is said to house many a phantom.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Eden Camp Museum
programme.desc: Once a prison camp during WWII, Eden Camp is now a museum housing many an artefact and many a ghost. Karl enters the cottage to face the spirits that are said to haunt this once family home.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: There are many ghost said to haunt Gloucester Prison, from the passive to the most aggressive and as Stuart enters the segregation block he soon fears for his life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: HMP Gloucester is a houses a huge selection of buildings, Karl investigates one block where spirits are said to make themselves known on a regular basis.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: Some places, just by their name, instill fear into those who hear it, Gloucester Prison is such a lace and Karl investigates the main cell block in an evening he will never forget.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: The education block of HMP Gloucester is an eerie set of corridors and empty rooms. Stuart enters for the first time and gradually realises that something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the very haunted school room in the large imposing Gressenhall Workhouse. The activity starts even before Karl gets into the building and becomes one of the most impressive investigations to date.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt1
programme.desc: The formidable visage of Guys Cliff House, a once great home, is awe inspiring, as are the stories pf paranormal activity within. Now home to the Masonic fraternity it is home to two temples and many lodges and chapters.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Guys Cliffe House Pt2
programme.desc: The lower Temple in this once great, but now ruined castle, is steeped in history and tales pf ghostly happenings. Stuart investigates a room that is said to house multiple spirits and feels something is watching him in the dark.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: TOWNELEY HALL Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding is back with the first part of a brand-new episode of Most Haunted. The intrepid ghost hunter has taken her team to the historic hall, which is said to be haunted by ancestral ghosts, the apparition of a white lady and a demon dog.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: I Am Not Guilty
programme.desc: The TAPS team investigates the home of Dr. Samuel Mudd, an alleged conspirator to the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Titanic Terror
programme.desc: TAPS gets on board the Titanic Exhibit at the Georgia Aquarium in Atlanta to investigate paranormal claims that have traveled around the world with the artifacts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Lemp Mansion
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the TAPS team is invited to Lemp Mansion in St. Louis, Missouri. There have been tragic deaths at this mansion with the patriarch and three of his children taking their own lives.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Fright At The Opera
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the team anticipates the possibility of encountering a demonic entity at the Burlingame & Chaffee Opera House, in Carthage, Missouri.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Last Will and Evidence
programme.desc: A bride-to-be has found her dream wedding venue....Burn Brae Mansion in Gley Spey, New York.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Empire State Haunt
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Taps heads to Fort William Henry located in Lake George, New York, where Ghost Hunters Academy winner Adam Berry joins the team.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Rockets Red Scare
programme.desc: TAPS travels back in time, to the 1700's to investigate the renowned USS Constitution, \\"Old Ironsides\\", which is docked in Boston, Massachusetts.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Glimmer Men
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Quincy, Massachusetts to investigate the unexplainable paranormal events that are haunting a 716 foot long ship.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Garden State Asylum
programme.desc: The TAPS team travels to New Jersey to investigate the infamous Essex County Hospital.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: An Affirming Flame
programme.desc: Dylan protects the Andromeda from mercenaries while Beka starts to wonder if they are fighting for the wrong side.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan finds a space station full of kids who believe he is there to bring peace by killing their enemies.

programme.title: Andromeda: D Minus Zero
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew is still learning how to work together as they are attacked by the Restorers.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double Helix
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets involved in a feud between a Than planet and a Nietzschean colony.

programme.title: Andromeda: Angel Dark, Demon Bright
programme.desc: A slipstream sends the Andromeda back in time to just before the Commonwealth fell. The crew must intervene to preserve history.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Answering a distress call leads the crew to pick up Beka's brother, now a Wayist, and his friend.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Banks of the Lethe
programme.desc: A black hole allows Dylan to communicate with his former fiancée, 300 years in the past.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: A Rose in the Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: The Pearls That Were His Eyes
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called F lash.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her sister ship, the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.240
programme.desc: A scam with online surveys causes a rift between a father and son over a fraudulent check. A woman, after her house burns down, has conflicts with her daughter's boyfriend's family over a wreck and unpaid rent.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.46
programme.desc: Man defends against ex-girlfriend's claim of unauthorized use and damage to her Buick Regal, insisting it was a hit-and-run/Woman sues former friend for allegedly stealing belongings stored in her garage.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.151
programme.desc: Neighbors sue over car windshields shot with BB gun. Lawsuit involves ominous chalk drawing of child, invasion of privacy, and harassment in volatile living arrangement dispute.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.90
programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of stalking; she alleges he cheated with child's mother. She sues for unpaid bills. Woman claims ex-fiancé is volatile; he sues for stopped check payment and punitive damages, alleging fraud.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.74
programme.desc: Young woman hit by car at underage drinking party blames icy driveway; driver claims she should have moved. Siblings fight over deceased father's home ownership, leading to a feud.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.169
programme.desc: Woman accuses toddler's grandmother of selling her belongings during prison term. Man denies dating former friend suing for unpaid loans and ring return, suggests she move on.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.259
programme.desc: A young tenant disputes custody of a band's equipment and unpaid rent with former landlords. Man sues seller and girlfriend for refund after alleged failed vehicle purchase from online ad.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.39
programme.desc: Ex-lovers dispute Suzuki motorcycle purchase, crash, and cancelled insurance.Young man arrested for assault, fails drug test, violates probation, bailed out by girlfriend; he claims bailout was birthday gift.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.45
programme.desc: A woman accuses her former live-in boyfriend of vandalism and skipping out on his share of the rent/Alleged harassment that led to a man’s dismissal at work and a dispute over an unpaid loan land ex-lovers in court.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.8
programme.desc: Teenagers dispute damages after breakup: iPhone thrown, windshield damaged/Judge Judy illustrates loan with paper scraps as unwed mother sues child's father for startup loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.2
programme.desc: Young man sues ex-lover for car repossession; demands down payment/Father sues son for loan; son claims partial forgiveness.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.20
programme.desc: Woman accuses ex of cheating in her home, he sues for furniture disposal and clothes destruction/Woman sues ex-roommate for back rent amid marijuana accusations, countersued for damaged property cost.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.207
programme.desc: Man regrets buying '95 Thunderbird, sued by fiancée's ex-friend. Another man claims god brother's estranged wife towed his car. Dog handler sues former customers over Chihuahua cost due to alleged gift card fraud.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.65
programme.desc: Man allegedly damages SUV during child custody exchange, claims admission under duress. Teenager sued by older sister for scooter balance; teen claims vehicle given in exchange for care of grandmother.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.141
programme.desc:
Alleged assaults and vicious scratching, rumors about injuring a			
child, and unpaid bills divide ex-lovers.			
Paternity tests and trailer storage come into play when a woman			
sues her daughter’s former friend for 13 months worth of rent.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.181
programme.desc: Two 18-year-old girls accused of spray painting each other’s cars trace their alleged vandalism back to high school issues. A 'tickling' incident between young lovers causes a shoulder injury and a dispute over treatment costs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.83
programme.desc: Judge Judy bets a year’s salary that a young man didn’t declare certain earnings on his tax return. He is sued by an ex-lover for loans, a hotel room, and a digital camera.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.54
programme.desc: Man sues mother of his child for totaled 1999 Nissan Ultima value and pawn retrieval costs; she claims car ownership/Former best friends dispute unpaid rent, bills for shared townhouse amid single motherhood and break-up.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.124
programme.desc: Man alleges vandalism and gang assault at family party/Man blames ex-girlfriend for inability to repay $9,000 car loan due to cheating and abandonment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.88
programme.desc: An alleged loan to pay off a sports gambling debt is disputed by ex- friends who disagree about whether or not they dated/A woman is suing her former friend for an alleged loan to catch-up on his delinquent truck payments.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.153
programme.desc: An incident of road rage escalates when a woman blows a kiss and laughs as she crosses the path of an angry, frustrated driver.\t\t\t\r\nClaiming she was kicked out illegally, a woman refuses to pay for rent and living expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.34
programme.desc: Mother falsely accused of child abuse by ex-husband, his mother, and roommate/Case dismissed after 17 abuse reports/Man sues great nephew for jeep damage; nephew claims fun spin caused crash.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants are given 30 minutes to create an entrée from surprise ingredients; Ramsay conducts one-on-one evaluations.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants visit one of Gordon Ramsay's restaurants; the teams prepare meals inspired by Ramsay's cuisine; the contestants face elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A team competition tests the contestants' knowledge of pork, with the winners receiving an indoor sky-diving experience; during dinner service, both teams face struggles.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After both teams are reorganized, the chefs blindly choose ingredients from which they must create a unique dish; the chefs must serve a five-course meal to UNICEF Ambassador Angie Harmon and other VIP attendees.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The red team and the blue team each create their own menus, from which guests can order during dinner service, the team that impresses diners with its food and service wins the challenge, contestants face elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants face the blind taste test, with the winning team getting an ice skating lesson with figure skater Rachael Flatt, and the contestants struggle to stay organized during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay challenges the teams to create entrees with high dollar values, using ingredients purchased on a small budget. Three previous winners judge individual contestants' entrees.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants prepare a dinner service with guests from OxFam America, including Minnie Driver, and two chefs struggle with their stations.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants travel to the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, where they cook gourmet versions of tailgate party food favourites for hungry football fans.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Special guest and comic book legend Stan Lee takes a seat at the chef's table, where he and his friends comment about the action in the kitchen as the service progresses.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jen at Work
programme.desc: Adam suggests that Jen do some freelance graphic design work for the company but Russell isn't crazy about the idea.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Optimal Male
programme.desc: Jeff's drive to be labeled an 'optimal male' on his life-insurance physical leads him to some extreme behavior, while Adam's over-friendliness with an ex-girlfriend unsettles Jennifer.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Father's Son
programme.desc: Russell puts on a show to impress his father when he comes to town, but both he and Adam learn the meaning of a parent's tough love. Meanwhile, an 'accident' in their apartment forces Adam and Jennifer to invade Audrey and Jeff's bathroom.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Buyer's Remorse
programme.desc: Jennifer and Adam attempt to practice fiscal responsibility as they consider buying their apartment. Audrey and Jeff offer to write their letter of recommendation, but end up making matters worse when they have a run-in with the landlady.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: May Divorce Be With You
programme.desc: When Audrey invites her and Jeff's recently divorced out of luck friend Steve to stay with them for a few days, Audrey thinks she may have become Steve's newest rebound.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Poaching Timmy
programme.desc: When Timmy grows tired of dealing with Russell's demeaning demands and Audrey has had it with her terrible assistant, the two find a possible solution in working together. Meanwhile, Jeff tries to recreate the conditions that led to a Giants win.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old Timer's Day
programme.desc: Jeff tries to prove to Audrey he's young and spry and invites her to watch him play softball. While up at bat, a simple sneeze throws his back out, but he insists on playing in the tournament game.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Challenge
programme.desc: When Jeff, Russell, and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three put their thinking caps on and rise up to the challenge.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.(n)

programme.title: What We Left Behind: Looking Back At Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: To commemorate 25 years of `Star Trek: Deep Space Nine', an exploration of the film's legacy. Full interviews as well as behind-the-scenes stories with the original team and actors will be presented and revisited.

programme.title: StarCrash
programme.desc: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn. (1978) Starring: Marjoe Gortner, David Hasselhoff, Caroline Munro, Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: Bandidas
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

programme.title: Love and Honor
programme.desc: While fighting in Vietnam, Dalton hears his girlfriend has dumped him so decides to fly to get her back. AWOL from the war zone, he has seven days to get back to the US, change his girlfriend's mind and make it back to Vietnam without anyone noticing.

programme.title: Temptation: Marriage Counselor
programme.desc: From Tyler Perry comes this provocative story of an ambitious married woman whose temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to devastating, life-altering consequences.

programme.title: The Body
programme.desc: A crucified body dated back to the first century A.D is uncovered at an ancient cave in Jerusalem. Trouble ensues as word spreads.(n)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Colin Firth star in this stirring drama about the friendship between Thomas Wolfe and editor Maxwell Perkins (who discovered F. Scott Fitzgerald and Ernest Hemingway).(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.

programme.title: The Battle of Midway: Dauntless
programme.desc: A U.S. carrier group is positioned off the coast of Midway in June 1942. During the battle, the two-man crew of a U.S. Navy dive bomber is forced to ditch in the sea. Amid the vast openness of the Pacific, the men are forced to face their own mortality.

programme.title: Banana Joe: Banana Joe
programme.desc: A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: From director of action blockbuster Lethal Weapon, Richard Donner. Personal demons put cop Jack (Bruce Willis - Die Hard) at rock bottom but he wasn’t about to let a witness be murdered on his watch.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: Laura, a single mom meets a fellow single dad Ben, who enlists her help in taking care of a cute corgi puppy he plans to give to his daughter at Christmas. Through all the chaos, Lauren gets the chance to finally experience the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Beaus Of Holly
programme.desc: Holly proposes to Phil, he confesses he needs to work things out with his ex. Having booked a romantic sleigh ride, Holly pours her heart out to the sleigh driver, Jake. Is Phil really for her, or is Jake the Christmas miracle she's been searching for?

programme.title: The Christmas Sitters
programme.desc: Facing holiday flight delays, two parents double-book incompatible babysitters: the mother's lawyer friend, Nora, and the dad's half-brother, Max, to look after their kids. An attraction grows and it seems a Christmas miracle might be on the cards.

programme.title: Holiday in The Hamptons
programme.desc: A woman inherits her grandfather's home in the Hamptons and reconnects with her childhood love.(n)

programme.title: Defending Santa
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff finds a man asleep in the woods who claims to be Santa Claus.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.

programme.title: A Sister’s Obsession
programme.desc: Kendra’s life couldn’t be more perfect – she has a loving husband, supportive best friend, and a blossoming career… and she was just awarded the title of "Educator of the Year.

programme.title: Stressed to Death
programme.desc: A former EMT still stricken with PTSD over not being able to save a man's life in time, becomes the target of the victim's wealthy wife who blames her for his death.

programme.title: Murder In The Vineyard
programme.desc: Life is amazing for Emma and her teenage daughter Beatrice when they move from the big city to an idyllic small town, but then Beatrice is hazed at a party one night by mysterious bullies. Emma sets out to find who the culprit is.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
programme.desc: An ambitious intern (Jurnee Smollett-Bell) at matchmaking firm for millionaires has an extramarital affair with a charismatic client (Robbie Jones) whose boldness and charm mask a dark side.

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Renowned editor Maxwell Perkins (Colin Firth) develops a friendship with author Thomas Wolfe (Jude Law) while working on the writer's manuscripts.

programme.title: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
programme.desc: An ambitious intern (Jurnee Smollett-Bell) at matchmaking firm for millionaires has an extramarital affair with a charismatic client (Robbie Jones) whose boldness and charm mask a dark side.(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: A faithful wife who is tired of standing by her devious husband is enraged when it becomes clear she has been betrayed.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Sam Buckhart arrives in North Fork in search of renegade Indians suspected of the brutal killing of a Texas Ranger and his family.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sid Fallon tries to blackmail former gambler Julia Andueza into allowing him to use her boarding house as a gambling hall and saloon.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas puts his life in jeopardy when he agrees to testify in a murder case where the first witness was killed before he could testify, and the killer is still at large.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Outlaw Sam Morley falls in love with a young woman who has a serious illness and asks Lucas to turn him in for the reward and use the money to pay for her medical care.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas welcomes his old friend Tom Birch, who once saved his life, unaware that the man is now a bank robber on the run with his gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Dan Maury, released from Yuma prison, arrives in North Fork intent on getting even with Marshal Torrance, who helped send him to jail.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Mark McCain is eager to help lawman Jay Jefferson, who has arrived in North Fork intent on killing an outlaw for the reward, whether he is the right man or not.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas comes to the rescue when escaped convicts hold up the general store in North Fork and take Marshall Torrance hostage.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Mark manages to capture a hawk but falls into danger with a rattlesnake. A stranger comes to his rescue and Mark invites the man home, unaware that he is on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas takes in an orphaned teen being raised by his abusive uncle after there is trouble at the school.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Wyatt Earp Rides Shotgun
programme.desc: Earp is asked by Wells Fargo to ride shotgun to help catch the Purvis gang. Earp agrees but a grandmother complicates the situation when she refuses to wait for a later stage.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Wyatt Fights
programme.desc: Earp is caught in the middle between two saloon owners who want to force the owners of the Long Branch Saloon out and take it over.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Ballad and Truth
programme.desc: Earp has to contend with the fallout and fights caused by the tall tales told by railroad engineer Tex McKay.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Schoolteacher
programme.desc: The stage arrives with the driver shot and $5000 of new silver dollar coins stolen. The driver gives Earp details about the robbery but they turn out to be false.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: When Sherman Marched Through Kansas
programme.desc: When word spreads through Dodge City that General Sherman would be making a stop there, havoc breaks out for Earp.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Big Brother Vigil
programme.desc: A divorced woman working the mayor's office and a childhood friend of the Earps, has Virgil Earp arriving to protect Wyatt from her.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: It Had to Happen
programme.desc: After Bat's shirt sleeve is hit by a bullet from a gunman Earp had hit in the shoulder, Mayor Kelley tell Earp he must shoot to kill which causes him to have second thoughts about his job.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 2
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Maire prays that her husband find the strength to let go of their 9 year marriage. Billy is asking that his wife receive the strength and wisdom to hold on. A 8-year-old runaway from heaven takes it upon herself to rekindle the romance that slipped away.

programme.title: The Amazing Burping Pig
programme.desc: When the Rose family move to California it's particularly hard on 7-year-old Talia, who finds it hard to make new friends. One day she finds a teacup pig with a serious burping problem but fearing her parents won't approve, she keeps him hidden.(n)

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.(n)

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.

programme.title: Accidentally Engaged
programme.desc: Famous actor Chas Hunter and aspiring actress Clarissa Byers agree to fake an engagement to improve both their reputations. However, playing pretend starts to feel all too real as the two start to fall for one another.

programme.title: Struck By Lightning
programme.desc: Carson Phillips is put in charge of publishing a school paper, but his fellow students aren't so keen to help. When he discovers a lot of the popular kids are keeping secrets, he decides to blackmail them in to helping him - what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: National Lampoon's Gold Diggers
programme.desc: A pair of losers marry two elderly sisters, thinking they'll inherit their fortune and Beverly Hills estate.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Henry V
programme.desc: Shakespeare's king attacks France in a drama that begins at the old Globe Theatre, becomes a movie and ends back on stage.

programme.title: Bitter Harvest
programme.desc: A rural young Welshwoman goes to London, meets a bartender and sinks into the wild night life.

programme.title: Carve Her Name With Pride
programme.desc: The valiant World War II French resistance fighter Violette Szabo sacrifices everything for her cause.

programme.title: Catch Us if You Can
programme.desc: Dinah is a model whose face appears in an ad campaign for meat. While shooting a TV commercial, she and Steve, one of the stunt men, run off together. The advertising executives use their disappearance to generate more publicity for meat.(n)

programme.title: Champagne Charlie
programme.desc: Musical comedy starring Tommy Trinder as the music hall star Champagne Charlie and his rise to become one of the best known music hall stars of the 19th Century.(n)
